name: EVA Hotmelt A0158.1
description: EVA Hotmelt A0158.1 is adhesives are natural products and may vary slightly in color. the hot-melt adhesive is elastic and has good low-temperature flexibility. it exhibits good adhesion to materials such as metals, wood, wood-based materials, ceramics, plastics such as ps, abs, hard pvc, plexiglas and pc, leather, textiles, paper and cardboard. the raw materials used comply with fda guideline 175.105 for the outer packaging of food products.
